short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch streaming videos from Netflix, Primevideo, Disney+ Hotstar, and Youtube with friends together with ReelRemy Party.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReelRemy Party lets you sync your streaming video and chat with friends together. Watch together with your favorites your favorite tv-series and movies.

How to Use :-)
1. Start playing the movie or TV show. Once the video starts playing, click the ReelRemy Party logo on the top right, click on the 'Start the Party' button. Thatâ€™s it.
2. Share the Invite link to add more participants.
3. Pause or Play to sync with your friends.

Features
:-) Supports streaming platforms - Netflix, Primevideo, Disney+ Hotstar, and Youtube. More coming soon. 
:-) GIFs, Stickers are available in plenty, click on the GIF icon in the chat input field, use the chat input field to search for gifs and Stickers.
:-) No need to pass instructions to friends to join the party. Just share the invite link, we will handle the rest.

For support, feedback, or any other comments reach us at reelremy2021@gmail.com
